availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William L. Mays (McCracken County, KY, farmer)

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Susan R. Clayton Mays. Father of Virginia Mays, Elizabeth Mays, Laura J. Mays, Miranda Mays, John W. Mays, Clayton Mays, William P. Mays, James H. Mays, Susan R. Mays, and Ida Mays. Farmer in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in McCracken County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 449B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 2, p. 839.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kansas, Montgomery County, Westralia, p. 662A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994046, McCracken County Births.
